import React from 'react'; import FacebookLogin from 'react-facebook-login'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import img1 from '../static/images/daily.svg'; import img2 from '../static/images/edit.svg'; import img3 from '../static/images/add-friend.svg'; import Maps from './Maps'; import Forms from './Forms'; class Facebook extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { isLoggedIn: this.props.isLoggedin, userID: '', name: '', email: '', picture: '', firstName: '' } this.responseFacebook = this.responseFacebook.bind(this); this.componentClicked = this.componentClicked.bind(this); } responseFacebook(response) { this.setState({ isLoggedIn: true, userID: response.userID, name: response.name, email: response.email, picture: response.picture.data.url }); const firstName = this.tokenizer(); this.setState({firstName: firstName}); console.log(this.state); } componentClicked() { console.log("clicked"); } tokenizer() { const name = this.state.name; const firstName = name.split(" ", 1); return firstName; } render() { let fbContent; if (this.state.isLoggedIn) { fbContent = (

Hello, {this.state.firstName}

What's The Task Today?

 ); } else { fbContent = (

TO-DO WEB APP

Manage Faster, Manage Better

FEATURES

Manage Daily

 Keep Track of Daily Tasks

Flexible Editing

 Modify Tasks Based on Personal Needs

User Friendly

 Simple Interface With Beautiful Design

CONTACT

); } return (
{fbContent}
)}}; export default Facebook;
